product_name: The North Face Logo Stretch Full-Zip Hoodie - Women's
long_description: The North Face Logo Stretch Full-Zip Hoodie for women is guaranteed to be the layer you grab whether you're on your way to a workout or the movies. Cotton/polyester/elastane stretch fleece blend is soft and easy to take care of; ribbing at cuffs and hem extends comfort. Double-layer attached hood has a contrast-color drawcord, contrasting color stitching at cuffs and hem and kangaroo pockets.
short_description: The North Face Logo Stretch Full-Zip Hoodie for women is guaranteed to be the layer you grab whether you're on your way to a workout or the movies.
